issue.title: Robot falls while carrying tools in habitat

content.raw:
@Tom_Xiong well the robot is falling for causes outside of our control, so in theory we are not subject to any time penalty, therefore we have infinite time to do this. Plus we're had no skipped tasks up to that point, so if we complete the next 3 tasks we get a perfect score... If we could just walk there. 

Opened #259 to track this issue.
